Cost of Freedom

A Collective Inquiry

The Book : Collective Memory | OPENING: FREEDOM | ARCHITECTONICS OF POWER | AFFORDANCES | Epilogue : Credits

Collective Memory

Bassel should be free. We will not stop campaigning for him until we see him as a free global citizen once again.

  • The Uncommon Creativity of Bassel Khartabil, by Barry Threw
  • Bassel, and My Freedom, by Noura Safadi
  • About Bassel, by Patrick W. Deegan
  • #NEWPALMYRA and the Free Bassel Campaign, by Jon Phillips
  • Palmyra 3D, Premonition Vision of Bassel, by Faraj Rifait
  • Rebuild Asad Al-Lat, by Georges Dahdouh
  • Supporting Bassel, by Ethan Zuckerman
  • What Does Freedom Mean to You, Mr. Government?, by Anasuya Sengupta
  • “Bassel K”, by Marc Weidenbaum
  • My Friend is Not Free, by Tyng-Ruey Chuang
  • Liberté, by Donatella Della Ratta
  • Free Bassel, by Maarten Zeinstra, and Muid Latif

  • Cost of Freedom
